name: places/ChIJs5Cx1KVZwokRUn3Y1g_cAqI
adrFormatAddress: 1133 Broadway #1023, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text:
I was recommended for this place and I had high hopes, but my experience was disappointing. I felt comfortable with Maura at first until I paid more attention to the practice and notice a big concern for patients well being.

I paid in total of about 1K in bills. I was provided with a portal usage but wasn't given much guidance on how to find  the info I needed. They are located in both NY and Connecticut but I didn't have the option to do a virtual visit in Connecticut or in person in Connecticut for insurance reasons. I went for a 60-minute virtual initial visit which the amount of time wasn't necessary so patients should have had the option to select the amount of time and amount they are comfortable in paying. Later, I ordered the test kit. It arrived at a timely matter but I didn't get full communication so then I needed to retest part of it. That means they needed to redeliver a test kit. There was no apology on their end with any mistakes made. The lab review appointment was brought up to me which seemed unnecessary as guidance was already provided by the lab so I declined it. Months later, I was provided a new set of pricing and the current patient would need to pay the new pricing despite not completing the process yet.

After I already made the visit, I found out they don't provide receipts for out-of-network claims. Despite claiming to be doctors, they lack recognition here and charge as if they have the title. The inaccurate time frame and miscommunication for my results was unsettling, and accessing them required additional follow ups.
Payment is required for Maura to review your lab results. Genuine doctors usually examine results without upfront payment. Notably, my test results showed red flags. When I sought a retest for progress, they suggested a 15-minute session, initially appearing complimentary, but an unexpected bill arrived in my inbox later. I decided to not attend due to uncertainty about an additional test kit request and potential unnecessary extra cost.

My overall impression is that this practice prioritizes financial gain over genuine concern for well-being during vulnerable times. I hope they will make things right.
--
UPDATE 2/7
I appreciated being contacted, as it indicated that my review had been acknowledged by the practice. I received both an email and a voicemail.

However, the experience soured after listening to the voicemail. She emphasized it being a bad review and her words didn't sound like she liked what I had to say. While she expressed a desire to make things right, there was no mention of how she planned to do so in either the email or voicemail for me to feel comfortable to respond back.

originalText.text: Thanks to Dr. Shannon, I became pregnant and I just cannot thank her enough, and express how happy I am to have found The Dr. Maura Practice. I’m in my late 30s and was diagnosed with unexplained infertility; my reproductive endocrinologist said my only choice was IVF. I knew that there was more to the story. A friend recommended this practice and Dr. Shannon. She spent a good deal of time understanding my history and ran a series of functional tests. From all of that, she was able to put together the ‘why’s’ around my infertility that no other doctor had even touched on. A few months into her protocol, I became pregnant naturally! I’m overjoyed and would recommend her and this practice to any woman who is looking to get answers around infertility.

I’m overjoyed and would recommend her and this practice to any woman who is looking to get answers around infertility.

originalText.text:
I wish I had found her years ago!

I’ve only been working with her for about 6 months, and I’ve seen so much improvement in my symptoms already! I’ve read a ton of books about functional medicine and thought I could “fix” myself on my own—but I didn’t realize how I would just be wasting time and resources. Also, all the heartache when I tried something and it didn’t work, and all the confusion about what to try next.

In hindsight, I would’ve been better off working with a professional sooner. Dr. Maura discovered something in my test results that wasn’t even on my radar; so I know that would’ve been an additional delay in my healing, had I not reached out to her. She is the real deal—she’s very knowledgeable, and kind—also she doesn’t judge, she doesn’t overwhelm, and the process for obtaining care is very easy—all via zoom and mail.  Her services are not covered by insurance, BUT our health is literally priceless. If we don’t have that, we cannot live life. In fact, I also will be “taking” my 11 year old daughter who suffers from stomach issues to Dr. Maura. And I’ve recommended her to so many people.

I love reading google reviews and so I hope this helps you make your decision about Dr. Maura, in the same way that others’ reviews helped me to make my excellent decision. Best wishes to you for good health!

originalText.text: I had been trying to understand why I felt "off" for the longest time and thankfully I met Dr. Patel. He has helped me identify the root cause of why I felt the way that I did. He took the time to explain everything and listened to my experience. He developed a plan to help me feel better and is always available for questions or additional support. It's been 3 months and I am finally feeling like my old self- Truly the best Doctor!!

originalText.text:
I originally saw Dr Maura a few months ago for cystic acne. As soon we began talking I knew I was in the right place. Dr Maura took the time to listen to my concerns and asked several questions that other doctors had not. Dr Maura asked me to take a couple of simple at home tests to provide more clues to what was going on.
We spoke a few weeks later and Dr Maura had developed a personalized treatment plan tailored to my specific needs. Under Dr Maura’s guidance I began a natural approach to clearing my skin. This included lifestyle adjustments, dietary recommendations, and a few supplements. Not only did my acne disappear within a month but my overall skin health dramatically improved. My confidence is back and my hair looks healthier as well.
I’m forever grateful Dr Maura’s expertise, compassion, and dedication while helping me achieve my goals all in natural way. I absolutely recommend this incredible doctor to anyone looking for a long lasting solution to their skin concerns.
